name: MCF-LW12MET
description: The MCF-LW12MET is an Enginko mcf88 LoRaWAN sensor with 1-phase energy measurement, which allows to monitor the power, voltage and current of electrical devices. It has an operating temperature of -10 °C to 70 °C and can be used in a variety of applications. The internal timestamp is synced with a downlink.
author: Akenza AG
